languages.text: "Вот и... вот и все. Как тихо. Голоса... они все еще есть, но это несравнимо с той какофонией, которую даже отборной обскурой не выходило заглушить. Я... могу заставить их замолчать".

traits.locale_text: "Вот и... вот и все. Как тихо. Голоса... они все еще есть, но это несравнимо с той какофонией, которую даже отборной обскурой не выходило заглушить. Я снова слышу себя на их фоне. Я снова в контроле".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Well... that's it done. It's so quiet. The voices... they're still here, but it's nothing like the clamour I lived in before. They were so loud I couldn't even drown them out with the best obscura. And now I... I can silence them whenever I want."
languages.original_text: "Вот и... вот и все. Как тихо. Голоса... они все еще есть, но это несравнимо с той какофонией, которую даже отборной обскурой не выходило заглушить. Я... могу заставить их замолчать".

traits.locale_text: "Well... that's it. It's so quiet. The voices... they're still here, but it's nothing like the clamour I lived in before, they were so loud I couldn't even drown them out with the best obscura. And now I... I can silence them whenever I want."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Well... that's it. It's so quiet. The voices... they're still here, but it's nothing like the clamour I lived in before, they were so loud I couldn't even drown them out with the best obscura. And now I... I can silence them whenever I want."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Well... that's it done. It's so quiet. The voices... they're still here, but it's nothing like the clamour I lived in before. They were so loud I couldn't even drown them out with the best obscura. And now I... I can silence them whenever I want."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Well... that's it done. It's so quiet. The voices... they're still here, but it's nothing like the clamour I lived in before. They were so loud I couldn't even drown them out with the best obscura. And now I... I can silence them whenever I want."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Well... that's it done. It's so quiet. The voices... they're still here, but it's nothing like the clamour I lived in before. They were so loud I couldn't even drown them out with the best obscura. And now I... I can silence them whenever I want."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “好吧……结束了，真的很安静。那些声音……它们还在我脑子里，但已经不像之前那么喧闹了。它们之前实在是太吵闹了，就算吸了最猛的迷酊，也盖不住它们的声音。可现在……只要我愿意，我随时都能让它们闭嘴。”
languages.original_text: "Well... that's it done. It's so quiet. The voices... they're still here, but it's nothing like the clamour I lived in before. They were so loud I couldn't even drown them out with the best obscura. And now I... I can silence them whenever I want."

traits.locale_text: “好吧……结束了，真的很安静。那些声音……它们还在我脑子里，但已经不像之前那么喧闹了。它们之前实在是太吵闹了，就算吸了最猛的迷酊，也盖不住它们的声音。可现在……只要我愿意，我随时都能让它们闭嘴。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Bueno... está hecho. Qué silencio. Las voces... siguen aquí, pero no se parece en nada al clamor en el que vivía antes. Hacían tanto ruido que no podía ahogarlas ni con la mejor obscura. Ahora... puedo acallarlas cuando quiera».
languages.original_text: "Well... that's it done. It's so quiet. The voices... they're still here, but it's nothing like the clamour I lived in before. They were so loud I couldn't even drown them out with the best obscura. And now I... I can silence them whenever I want."

traits.locale_text: «Bueno... está hecho. Qué silencio. Las voces... siguen aquí, pero no se parece en nada al clamor en el que vivía antes. Hacían tanto ruido que no podía ahogarlas ni con la mejor obscura. Ahora... puedo acallarlas cuando quiera».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Nun ... das wäre vollbracht. Es ist so still. Die Stimmen ... sie sind noch hier, doch es ist nicht mehr das Gewirr, in dem ich bisher gelebt habe. Sie waren so laut, dass ich sie nicht einmal mit dem besten Obscura übertönen konnte. Und nun kann ich ... nun kann ich sie verstummen lassen, wann immer ich will."
languages.original_text: "Well... that's it done. It's so quiet. The voices... they're still here, but it's nothing like the clamour I lived in before. They were so loud I couldn't even drown them out with the best obscura. And now I... I can silence them whenever I want."

traits.locale_text: "Nun ... das wäre vollbracht. Es ist so still. Die Stimmen ... sie sind noch hier, doch es ist nicht mehr das Gewirr, in dem ich bisher gelebt habe. Sie waren so laut, dass ich sie nicht einmal mit dem besten Obscura übertönen konnte. Und nun kann ich ... nun kann ich sie verstummen lassen, wann immer ich will."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「さて…これで終わりね。とても静かだわ。声たちは…まだここにいるけど、前に感じていた喧噪とは全然違う。あの時はとてもうるさくて、最高のオブスキュラを使ってもかき消せなかったの。だけど今は…いつでも静かにさせることができる」
languages.original_text: "Well... that's it done. It's so quiet. The voices... they're still here, but it's nothing like the clamour I lived in before. They were so loud I couldn't even drown them out with the best obscura. And now I... I can silence them whenever I want."

traits.locale_text: 「さて…これで終わりね。とても静かだわ。声たちは…まだここにいるけど、前に感じていた喧噪とは全然違う。あの時はとてもうるさくて、最高のオブスキュラを使ってもかき消せなかったの。だけど今は…いつでも静かにさせることができる」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Eh bien, voilà qui est fait. Quel calme. Les voix... elles sont toujours là, mais rien de comparable à la clameur dans laquelle je vivais jusqu'ici. Elles étaient si bruyantes que je ne pouvais même pas les étouffer avec la meilleure obscura. Et maintenant, je... je peux les faire taire quand je veux. »
languages.original_text: "Well... that's it done. It's so quiet. The voices... they're still here, but it's nothing like the clamour I lived in before. They were so loud I couldn't even drown them out with the best obscura. And now I... I can silence them whenever I want."

traits.locale_text: « Eh bien, voilà qui est fait. Quel calme. Les voix... elles sont toujours là, mais rien de comparable à la clameur dans laquelle je vivais jusqu'ici. Elles étaient si bruyantes que je ne pouvais même pas les étouffer avec la meilleure obscura. Et maintenant, je... je peux les faire taire quand je veux. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Eh... Tamam. Ortalık sakinledi. Sesler hepten gitmedi ama eskiden olduğu gibi feryat etmiyorlar. Şiddetleri o kadar yüksekti ki en iyi obsküra bile fayda etmiyordu. Artık... Artık istediğimde onları susturabiliyorum."
languages.original_text: "Well... that's it done. It's so quiet. The voices... they're still here, but it's nothing like the clamour I lived in before. They were so loud I couldn't even drown them out with the best obscura. And now I... I can silence them whenever I want."

traits.locale_text: "Eh... Tamam. Her şey çok sessiz. Sesler hâlâ burada ama eskiden olduğu gibi feryat etmiyorlar. Sesleri o kadar yüksekti ki en iyi obsküra bile fayda etmiyordu. Şimdi... İşte şimdi onları istediğimde susturabilirim."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
